armorHud.configScreen.title: Slotted Armor HUD mod config
armorHud.configScreen.setting.side.name: Side
armorHud.configScreen.setting.style.name: Style
armorHud.configScreen.setting.enable.des: Toggles the armor HUD on and off.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.orientatio:
Orientation of the armor HUD along 
 the XY axes.
 Horizontal
 Vertical
armorHud.configScreen.setting.side.descr:
Side that the armor HUD is displayed on. 
Works in conjunction with 'Anchor'.
 Left
 Right
armorHud.configScreen.setting.anchor.des:
Place that the armor HUD is attached to. 
Works in conjunction with 'Side'.
 Top
 Bottom
 Hotbar 
 Top_Center
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offhandSlo:
Defines how the armor HUD reacts to the 
offhand slot and the attack indicator.
 Leave_Space
 Adhere
 Ignore
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offsetX.de:
Offsets the armor HUD along the 
horizontal axis.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.offsetY.de:
Offsets the armor HUD along the 
vertical axis.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.slotsShown:
Defines when and which armor slots are 
shown.
 Show_Equipped
 Show_All
 Always_Show
armorHud.configScreen.setting.emptyIcons: Displays an armor outline in empty slots.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.reversed.d:
Reverses the order of items shown in 
the armor HUD.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.pushBossba: Pushes bossbars below the armor HUD.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.pushStatus:
Pushes status effect icons below the 
armor HUD.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.pushSubtit: Pushes subtitles above the armor HUD.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.slotTextur:
The texture of the selected hotbar slot 
will be used for slot 1.

The texture of the selected hotbar slot 
will be used for slot 2.

The texture of the selected hotbar slot 
will be used for slot 3.

The texture of the selected hotbar slot 
will be used for slot 4.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.borderLeng:
Borders and slot backgrounds are drawn 
separately. This option defines how much 
of the border is drawn.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.matchBorde:
Matches the border texture to the 
texture of the selected hotbar slot
(configured above).
 If turned off, the border will use 
 [Slot Texture 1] for all borders.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.minOffsetB:
The minimum Y offset required before 
subtitles are pushed.
armorHud.configScreen.setting.style.desc:
Defines how the armor HUD border is drawn.
Resource packs work best with 'Squared'.
 Squared
 Rounded
